description: A storage location with an associated name
A collection of elements of the same type
A mechanism where a class inherits properties from another
A variable that stores memory address
Multiple methods with same name but different parameters
example: public int add(int a, int b); public double add(double a, double b);
template<class T> T max(T a, T b) { return (a > b) ? a : b; }

description: Variables that belong to the class rather than instance
